website_summaries.verdict: With five seats and a sun canopy, this paddle boat from Sun Dolphin is a sure bet for family fun.
pros: Adjustable reclining seating for three adults and two children
Pedal positions for one, two, or three people
Built-in cooler or storage area with beverage holders
Rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex High Density Polyethylene deck and hull
cons: Consider removing from water and tipping up when not in use or making cover more secure

customer_reviews.title: Please make this right! Pick up the boat with the holes and replace with a new one without holes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boat and so upset, went to put the boat in the water today and found 3 holes. Hope that I can get a new one before my friends and family arrive next week. Looks like holes from shipping, fork truck/lift.
customer_reviews.author: Jill N.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Handling Caused Damage
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the product itself is a great product. However, we had it shipped to us and the product was mishandled prior to delivery. There were gouges out of the frame, scratches, and slices to the body. The worst, which we did not see right away, was two deep gouges to the underside of the paddle housing which appeared to be impressions left by the fork points of a fork lift. Employees need to be reprimanded for ruining the product. It was a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara S. Delozier

customer_reviews.title: Not the product shown
customer_reviews.text: The product shown has not been made for over 9 months according to the Vendor. The picture has not been updated by Amazon, the difference is the new ones now come with an Gray Canopy. The boat does hold five but has a 550 pound limitation, so that would be five small adults. It paddles and turns very nice and is very light weight. The reason for the 4 star is not being able to get the color canopy I really want.
customer_reviews.author: BAL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seating, but really need 2 people to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable seating, but really need 2 people to make it steer where you want to go. Great for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Received my boat today. Timing perfect. Since I live alone the truck drivers loaded the boat onto my pick up so I can take it to my pond. I really appreciate that. Boat looks great. Cover is gray not blue but I won't be using it anyway. Once I get it in the water I will write more. For now I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: susie sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Cruisin
customer_reviews.text: We love our Pedal Boat. It's at our lake cottage. No more renting one for 2 hours and racing to return. We can be very lazy on Lake Huron.
customer_reviews.author: holijudge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, alot of fun and easy. But very very heavey
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love my paddle boat
customer_reviews.text: Love my new paddle boat. Unfortunately it came with some damage to the foam around the steering wand but we are enjoying it just the same.
customer_reviews.author: SDKAREN

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Canopy material is very thin will not hold up for long. Boat itself seems to be good quality and sturdy. Rudder is small and marginally effective. You have to work to get this thing moving, not for windy days. Best for very small ponds and grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: WBS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this and use it often. Very well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Latoshia

customer_reviews.title: If u are very tall the pedals are too close
customer_reviews.text: Love my boat. It’s easy to pedal & the top not only looks good but helps with the lake. I use mine at Lake Martin Al.
customer_reviews.author: beach4au

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it! on-board cooler and cup-holders are a nice touch too!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: A bit time hit for our family
customer_reviews.text: We put this in the lake and have used it for hours so far. GREAT exercise without thinking that you are iT changed the experience we would have on the lake - so nice slowing down from the motor boat and taking in all the sites, seeing more of nature It fits 5 people easily and is quite large but easy to put in and out of the water with handles built into the front - one person !
customer_reviews.author: Cheapo-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great boat for price
customer_reviews.text: price was right. The only issue thus far is that the steering is a bit stiff. Might be easier to steer if there was more leverage (longer steering bar). Not a significant problem.
customer_reviews.author: ricknokc

customer_reviews.title: ... was hoping for in a small paddle boat- stable- easy to paddle- my grandkids love it and having the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I was hoping for in a small paddle boat- stable- easy to paddle- my grandkids love it and having the canopy is a big plus- nice and light and easy to move
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the pedal boat. Lots of fun, great exercise. Glad we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Lucci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this product is awesome. we have been enjoying it daily since it arrived
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES ODIPO

customer_reviews.title: RELAXING
customer_reviews.text: A LOT OF FUN GOOD WAY TO GET OUT ON THE WATER AND WORK OUT NO PROBLEMS HAD IT ALMOST A MONTH
customer_reviews.author: Dee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price should be a lot fun for our grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: George E Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids new paddle boat
customer_reviews.text: We had our paddle boat stolen at the same time our grandkids were old enough to start taking it out on there own. This was two years ago, and we finally were able to replace it. We received our new boat and are totally happy with it! The delivery time was great, and the boat itself was exactly what we expected! The fun started the day it was received and has continued since. Great boat! Great price! One happy Grandma!
customer_reviews.author: missionbeach2012

customer_reviews.title: nice ride.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice we took it out twice now, but it did not come with a book, so we were on our owe. Will not hold five comfortably. Four
customer_reviews.author: Sharon l Landrem

customer_reviews.title: Very happy now!
customer_reviews.text: Finally received mt shipment, did not know it would be shipped freight, this takes longer. Very happy now!
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and adults too
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present and so we weren't expecting to use it until this summer or at least late Spring, but we were anxious and had a particularly warm day last week so we tried it. It was so much fun. The kids love it. The cup holders could be a bit deeper. I shopped around and Amazon had it for the best price. The pedals work great and it steers pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Loved Sun Dolphin - but now it's gone
customer_reviews.text: My family and myself loved the Sun Dolphin - I say loved because someone stole it after we had it for two months. I don't know if you can help in any way, but we really did it and have reported it to the Holderness Police and Squam Lake Patrol from the New Hampshire Department of Fish and Game. We are so upset and can't believe someone could do this, Can you help?
customer_reviews.author: Jane Schindler

customer_reviews.title: very good boat.
customer_reviews.text: We like this boat. It's light and durable. it's fit for family. It's good for lake not river. We enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: PEDAL BOAT
customer_reviews.text: THE BOAT ARRIVED ON TIME AND IN PERFECT SHAPE,LOVED IT RIGHT FROM THE START,MY DAUGHTER AND I USED IT RT AWAY,SHE LOVED PEDALING AND WITH THE CANOPY IT WAS GREAT TO BLOCK THE SUN.
customer_reviews.author: The Rock

customer_reviews.title: Sun Dolphin Pedal Boat
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. It came just as it was promised right on time and in perfect shape. Kids are having fun.
customer_reviews.author: nanamarie

customer_reviews.title: Nice little boat
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just as advertised and that is all we have to say everything else is to use up the annoying word count requirement
customer_reviews.author: John F. Miller

customer_reviews.title: It is very heavy
customer_reviews.text: I like how like how good it handles is the waves.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Forneris

product_meta.title: Sun Dolphin 5 Seat Pedal Boat with Canopy
product_meta.description:
The Sun Dolphin 5 Seat Pedal Boat comfortably seats three adults and two children with pedal positions for 1, 2, or 3 people. The deck and hull of this 5-seat pedal boat are crafted of rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex high-density polyethylene. The Sun Dolphin pedal boat features dual rear coolers or storage compartments, a built-in extra storage area and beverage holders to make your ride smooth and pleasant. Includes sun canopy for UV ray protection..


***Important information when placing your order***


Please verify address and telephone# are accurate. The carriers will contact the phone number on the order to set up a delivery appointment. If this information is inaccurate, there is a possibility that your order will be delayed or cancelled with a possible fee incurred at the sellers discretion.



AMAZON.COM
Cruise around the lake in comfort and style with the Sun Dolphin five-person pedal boat. The Sun Dolphin, which includes a water-repellant polyester canopy for sun protection, seats three people in the front and two in the back. As a result, the boat easily accommodates both families and groups of friends as they make the most of a warm day. The Sun Dolphin's construction, meanwhile, is tough and long lasting, with a rugged, UV-stabilized Fortiflex polyethylene deck and hull, an aluminum tiller steering system, and a super-tough paddle wheel. Best of all, the boat easily books across the water thanks to the three-position pedal cranks, which allow for one-, two, or three-person operation. Just settle in, place a beverage in the recessed drink holders, and start pedaling. The boat even includes built-in coolers for pop, water, and other cool beverages (the coolers can also function as storage areas). 

 Other details include a folding canopy design; high-back support; a built-in motor mount; a protective vinyl rub rail; maintenance-free, oil-impregnated bronze bushings with rubber seals; a mooring cleat; and light-colored decks for maximum comfort on hot days. 

 Specifications:

 * Capacity: 825 pounds 
 * Length: 93 inches 
 * Width: 65 inches 
 * Height: 24.5 inches 
 * Weight: 110 pounds 
 * Deck: Pewter 
 * Hull: Blue/teal 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Sun Dolphin five person is the most popular size pedal boat. It's a true five person boat. The front seat positions for three adults and two rear seats for children. It accommodates one, two or three pedal positions so the boat always remains in proper balance to optimize performance. It features exceptional seating comfort with high back rests.

See more
feature_bullets: Comfortably seats three adults and two children
Rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex High Density Polyethylene deck and hull
Includes sun canopy for UV ray protection
***IMPORTANT – phone number is needed to schedule a delivery appointment***
